project_abstract.cdata: In this Agriculture Credit Project, Bank funds will support a lending program of the BDA that will finance up to 80% of a $50.4 million program of investments by medium and large farmers. Some small commercial farmers may participate through associations which are being created. Incremental production is projected of corn, sorghum, kidney beans, black beans, rice, groundnuts, citrus and coconuts. Agricultural processing industries will also be eligible for subloans.
